description:
dagger: silver with etched designs; woman on one wide side of hilt with man on other; floral motif on narrow hilt sides with undecorated notch above; single floral/ star motif on hilt butt; blade etched at top with floral motif on one side, inscription on other; floral motif on raised ridge down center of blade on both sides; blade covered with swirling marks; scabbard: silver with etched designs; floral motif at top and tip; raised metal button on one side at top.
Arms and Armor-Edged Weapon
dimension: 14 5/8 x 1 5/16 x 1 1/16 in. (37.15 x 3.33 x 2.7 cm) (overall, dagger in sheath)
marks: Inscription, top of blade on one side (etched): [I
title: European-Style Dagger and Sheath
